text.value: Turns towards the origin of sound (2-3 months)
Extend hand to grasp a toy (2-3 months)

bind.calculate: concat( concat( /immunization_service/patient_age_in_years , if( /immunization_service/patient_age_in_years =1,' year and ',' years and ')), concat( /immunization_service/patient_age_in_months mod 12, if(( /immunization_service/patient_age_in_months mod 12)=1,' month old',' months old')) )

if( /immunization_service/needs_immunization_follow_up = 'yes' or /immunization_service/needs_vitamin_a_follow_up = 'yes' or /immunization_service/needs_growth_monitoring_follow_up = 'yes' or /immunization_service/group_follow_up/needs_to_go_to_health_facility ='yes' or /immunization_service/is_available_and_completed_visit ='no' or /immunization_service/is_available ='no' or /immunization_service/group_summary/r_child_dewormed = 'no', 'yes', 'no')

concat(if( /immunization_service/needs_immunization_follow_up = 'yes', 'Immunization, ', ''), if( /immunization_service/needs_vitamin_a_follow_up = 'yes', 'Vitamin A, ', ''), if( /immunization_service/needs_growth_monitoring_follow_up = 'yes', 'Growth and Monitoring', ''))

bind.relevant: (( /immunization_service/has_bcg =0 or /immunization_service/has_opv_0 =0 or /immunization_service/has_opv_1 =0 or /immunization_service/has_opv_2 =0 or /immunization_service/has_opv_3 =0 or /immunization_service/has_pcv_1 =0 or /immunization_service/has_pcv_2 =0 or /immunization_service/has_pcv_3 =0 or /immunization_service/has_penta_1 =0 or /immunization_service/has_penta_2 =0 or /immunization_service/has_penta_3 =0 or /immunization_service/has_ipv =0 or /immunization_service/has_rota_1 =0 or /immunization_service/has_rota_2 =0 or /immunization_service/has_rota_3 =0 or /immunization_service/has_vitamin_a =0 or /immunization_service/has_measles_6_months =0 or /immunization_service/has_measles_9_months =0 or /immunization_service/has_measles_18_months =0) and /immunization_service/group_vaccines/has_received_vaccines ='no' and /immunization_service/total_due_vaccines > 0) or (count-selected(../vaccines_given) > 0 and instance('contact-summary')/context/count_due_vaccines > count-selected(../vaccines_given))

bind.jr:constraintMsg: None cannot be selected with any other option!
None cannot be selected with any other option!

bind.calculate: if( /immunization_service/insurance/has_upto_date_insurance = 'yes', 'Insurance upto date', 'Insurance not upto date')

input.label: **If relocated remember to submit a muting request, if they died remember to submit a death report.**
Message to CHP: Find out why and encourage them to go.

select1.label: Does still need to go to the health facility?

input.label: Message to CHP: Explain to the caregiver the importance of immunization and REFER the child to the nearest Health Center where the child can be immunised. Follow up in 3 days to see if child has been immunized.
Message to CHP if should go to the Health facility any time they feel unwell

select1.label: Indicate the source of the Immunization information

select.label: Tick all vaccines that were given

itemset.nodeset: instance('vaccines')/root/item[ /immunization_service/patient_age_in_weeks != '' and ( (name_compat = 'bcg' and /immunization_service/has_bcg =0 and /immunization_service/patient_age_in_days >= 0) or (name_compat = 'opv0' and /immunization_service/has_opv_0 =0 and /immunization_service/patient_age_in_days >= 0) or (name_compat = 'opv1' and /immunization_service/has_opv_1 =0 and /immunization_service/patient_age_in_weeks >= 6) or (name_compat = 'opv2' and /immunization_service/has_opv_2 =0 and /immunization_service/patient_age_in_weeks >= 10) or (name_compat = 'opv3' and /immunization_service/has_opv_3 =0 and /immunization_service/patient_age_in_weeks >= 14) or (name_compat = 'pcv1' and /immunization_service/has_pcv_1 =0 and /immunization_service/patient_age_in_weeks >= 6) or (name_compat = 'pcv2' and /immunization_service/has_pcv_2 =0 and /immunization_service/patient_age_in_weeks >= 10) or (name_compat = 'pcv3' and /immunization_service/has_pcv_3 =0 and /immunization_service/patient_age_in_weeks >= 14) or (name_compat = 'penta1' and /immunization_service/has_penta_1 =0 and /immunization_service/patient_age_in_weeks >= 6) or (name_compat = 'penta2' and /immunization_service/has_penta_2 =0 and /immunization_service/patient_age_in_weeks >= 10) or (name_compat = 'penta3' and /immunization_service/has_penta_3 =0 and /immunization_service/patient_age_in_weeks >= 14) or (name_compat = 'ipv' and /immunization_service/has_ipv =0 and /immunization_service/patient_age_in_weeks >= 14) or (name_compat = 'rota1' and /immunization_service/has_rota_1 =0 and /immunization_service/patient_age_in_weeks >= 6) or (name_compat = 'rota2' and /immunization_service/has_rota_2 =0 and /immunization_service/patient_age_in_weeks >= 10) or (name_compat = 'rota3' and /immunization_service/has_rota_3 =0 and /immunization_service/patient_age_in_weeks >= 14) or (name_compat = 'vit_a' and /immunization_service/has_vitamin_a =0 and /immunization_service/patient_age_in_months >= 6) or (name_compat = 'measles_9' and /immunization_service/has_measles_9_months =0 and /immunization_service/patient_age_in_months >= 9) or (name_compat = 'measles_18' and /immunization_service/has_measles_18_months =0 and ( /immunization_service/patient_age_in_months >= 18)) )]

select.label: Tick these vaccines if they were given

itemset.nodeset: instance('optional_vaccines')/root/item[ /immunization_service/patient_age_in_weeks != '' and ( (name_compat = 'measles_6' and /immunization_service/has_measles_6_months =0 and /immunization_service/patient_age_in_months >= 6) or (name_compat = 'malaria' and /immunization_service/has_malaria_vaccine =0) )]

select.label: Tick all the vaccines you are referring the child for

itemset.nodeset: instance('vaccines')/root/item[ /immunization_service/patient_age_in_weeks != '' and ( (name_compat = 'bcg' and /immunization_service/has_bcg =0 and /immunization_service/patient_age_in_days >= 0) or (name_compat = 'opv0' and /immunization_service/has_opv_0 =0 and /immunization_service/patient_age_in_days >= 0) or (name_compat = 'opv1' and and /immunization_service/has_penta_3 =0 and /immunization_service/patient_age_in_weeks >= 14) or (name_compat = 'ipv' and /immunization_service/has_ipv =0 and and ( /immunization_service/patient_age_in_months >= 18)) )]

input.label: **Explain to the caregiver the importance of immunization and REFER the child to the nearest Health Center where the child can be immunized.**

**Thank the caregiver for ensuring that their child's immunization status is completed. Encourage the caregiver to ensure that the child receives Vitamin A every 6 months until the child is 5 years old.**
**REFER the child to the nearest Health Center where the child can be immunized.**

select.label: Which Vitamin A dose has received?

itemset.nodeset: instance('vitamin_a_doses')/root/item[(age_limit_lower <= /immunization_service/patient_age_in_weeks and (dose_6_months_group != /immunization_service/has_vitamin_a_6_months or dose_12_months_group != /immunization_service/has_vitamin_a_12_months or dose_18_months_group != /immunization_service/has_vitamin_a_18_months or dose_24_months_group != /immunization_service/has_vitamin_a_24_months or dose_30_months_group != /immunization_service/has_vitamin_a_30_months or dose_36_months_group != /immunization_service/has_vitamin_a_36_months or dose_42_months_group != /immunization_service/has_vitamin_a_42_months or dose_48_months_group != /immunization_service/has_vitamin_a_48_months or dose_54_months_group != /immunization_service/has_vitamin_a_54_months or dose_60_months_group != /immunization_service/has_vitamin_a_60_months or all = 1))]

input.label: **Advice the care giver that Vitamin A promotes good vision, boosts immunity and promotes growth and development and Refer.**
Advice the care giver that deworming prevents worms which interferes with growth and development of a child.
Check the Mother and Child Health (MCH) Handbook or other source of data

select1.label: Is participating in monthly growth monitoring?

input.label: **Advice the primary caregiver on importance of regular checking the weight of the baby and Encourage them to take the child to the clinic for monthly growth monitoring.**

select.label: Is the child showing signs of delayed developmental milestones?

input.label: **Refer to the health facility for further assessment.**
Encourage to get an insurance cover if they don't have or to update their insurance cover

select.label: Which medical insurance cover does have?

input.label: Congratulate and encourage them to continue updating their insurance cover
Be sure you Submit to complete this action.
Growth monitoring status not upto date
Vitamin A status not upto date
Turns towards the origin of sound (2-3 months)
Extend hand to grasp a toy (2-3 months)
Educate the caregiver and refer to the health facility for:
